::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus did not reply to Perceptor but took his advice=
. He did not like this acknowlegment of his past.
=A0
Rodimus: Computer, th=
is is Commanding Officer Rodimus Prime. Activate internal defenses. Target =
all non-Maximal signatures.
=A0
Comp: Scan shows that you are Rodimus Prime=
 as stated. However there is a minor inacuracy in your signature patterns.
=
=A0
Rodimus: Exclude me from targets.
=A0
Comp: Processing...
=A0
The ships=
 internal defenses click on. Forcefields seal off the area where the Minion=
s are. Autoguns swing into place and begin to fire.
=A0
Rodimus lets out a =
small chuckle. He checks himself over as he runs. His signature masker was =
still operating but the grenade blast had fried his cloaking device.
=A0
Fi=
nall he is coming up on an outer wall. Two rockets later and there is just =
a hole. Rodimus leaps out, transforming to behical mode. He lands on all sc=
reeching tires. Heading for Mt. St. Hillary.

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus did not reply to Perceptor but took his advice. He did not like this acknowlegment of his past.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus: Computer, this is Commanding Officer Rodimus Prime. Activate internal defenses. Target all non-Maximal signatures.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Comp: Scan shows that you are Rodimus Prime as stated. However there is a minor inacuracy in your signature patterns.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus: Exclude me from targets.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Comp: Processing...</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The ships internal defenses click on. Forcefields seal off the area where the Minions are. Autoguns swing into place and begin to fire.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus lets out a small chuckle. He checks himself over as he runs. His signature masker was still operating but the grenade blast had fried his cloaking device.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Finall he is coming up on an outer wall. Two rockets later and there is just a hole. Rodimus leaps out, transforming to behical mode. He lands on all screeching tires. Heading for Mt. St. Hillary.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Thu, 7/3/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
